reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I spent 3 nights at La Casa De Piedra Hotel during our honeymoon in 2006. Our stay was amazing! The town is beautiful and well worth the extra traveling time to get there. We were lucky to find such a nice hotel with a wonderful staff that was more than happy to help us have a beautiful time. The husband and wife who own the hotel arranged a horseback riding excursion as well as gave us great tips on dining.
reviews.title: Loved It!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was very large with a rustic feel, yet with all the amenities you would need. The hotel is located very close to the center of the town. Sunday market is exceptional.
reviews.title: A gem in the rain forest

likes.liked: — The beauty of the area and the staff wish to make our stay perfect!
likes.disliked: — It is helpful to know Spanish
